name: Tapestry of the Month Before
description:
This is a game for Windows.

Tapestry open-ended RPG with a good focus on exploration. You can battle in-game or ignore it entirely. A very quirky game with sense of humor.

It is a completed original game that takes inspiration from the quirky worlds and characters of Paper Mario and Earthbound mixed with open ended exploration and dialogue choices of Baldur’s Gate and Planescape: Torment.

Tapestry of The Month Before was made to work through the technical, design and writing challenges of what this game would be like. It’s a proof of concept and as a jumping off point for the main project I’m working on.
